name: BARC ELECTRIC COOPERATIVE
description: A nonprofit electric cooperative providing electric and broadband services to the public.
sampleDescriptions: Secure federal funding and influence policy to support expanding high speed internet access to rural communities and expand use and implementation of new electric technologies.
